channel.title: How do i make npcs hit on deltascape
channel.description: I've added the Corporal Beast, but now it will only hit 0's please help?

item.title: How do i make npcs hit on deltascape
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

You have to add the npc to npc.cfg, and then add the level.

item.title: How do i make npcs hit on deltascape
item.dc:creator: @_Achmed _Achmed_
item.description:
@_Achmed wrote:

Add this on Npchandler

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 5 && plr.ProtMelee == false) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 407; hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(15); plr.playerLevel[5] -= 3; plr.sendQuest("" + plr.playerLevel[5] + "", 4012); } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 5 && plr.ProtMelee == true) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 407; hitDiff = 0; plr.playerLevel[5] -= 3; plr.sendQuest("" + plr.playerLevel[5] + "", 4012);

Add it under

npcType == 1472

Read full topic
